objects.text:
• Premium gold-plated design
• Double row of pearls
• Perfect for any occasion
• Timeless elegant style

product_details.name: Elegant Pearl & Gold Wave Hoop Earrings - Luxury Statement Piece
product_details.description:
• Premium gold-plated curved design for sophisticated style
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Modern wave silhouette perfect for both casual and formal wear
• Secure post-back closure for comfortable all-day wear
• Versatile half-hoop design measures approximately 1 inch in length
• High-quality craftsmanship with smooth, polished finish
• Timeless combination of pearls and gold-tone metal
• Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear
• Perfect accessory for weddings, special occasions, or everyday elegance
• Comes as a matching pair with mirror-finish reflection

banner_details:
This banner presents a stylish promotional layout for elegant jewelry. It is divided into four quadrants with a sophisticated color-blocked design. The top-left quadrant contains bold text layers: `heading_1`, `heading_2`, and `subheading` arranged in a vertical stack with dark brown font against a beige background, accompanied by soft abstract curves. The right side shows product images (`product_image_1` and `product_image_2`) of golden pearl earrings with reflections, seamlessly integrated into golden and off-white backgrounds. In the bottom-left quadrant, the `description` text layer lists features in a soft golden hue on a deep chocolate brown panel. Beneath it, the `price` appears in a modern, tech-style font. A rectangular button labeled by the `cta` layer sits within the `cta_background` shape with rounded corners.

**Color Palette**:
- Gold: #D4AF37
- Deep Brown: #4A3C2C
- Beige: #E8D0A9
- Off-White: #F9F3E5
- Light Ivory: #F5F5F5
product_color: The product image displays a pair of luxury earrings with a sophisticated gold and pearl design. The dominant color is a rich, reflective metallic gold (#D4AF37), which adds a sense of opulence and elegance. Accentuating this base is a trio of delicate white pearls (#F8F8F8), arranged in soft rows that provide texture and contrast. Subtle shadows and highlights in warm amber (#C1903F) and soft beige (#F5E9D7) enhance the 3D form, creating dimension. The gold and white blend harmoniously, yet each is highlighted through glossy reflections and contours, making them ideal for an ad banner focused on luxury and refinement.
